messages.message:
I didn't get a notification in the UI that my files had finished processing in the Ground Truth creation screen. Instead I ended up waiting because I thought they were taking some time here

cc @hannah
Thanks for feedback! This definitely would help cc: @Serena @lydia

yep this is a piece of feeback we’ve heard many times https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C0516UPPMT3/p1727196411883319?thread_ts=1727187507.838149&cid=C0516UPPMT3 (captured in https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/INSIGHTS-7015)

@Hamish is it because with the modal, it isn't clear what the action is? (the action is Close) Once you close the modal, you will see progress indicator in the ground truth table, similar to what you see in app run
if that's the issue, it feels like we could auto-close the modal and add a banner at the top of the page indicating the next step? (e.g. click "Review required")
yep that’s basically the suggestion documented in the ticket: auto-close the modal after a certain amount of time, and show a toast to indicate the next step
